import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Link componentini ekleyin const handleClick = async ()=>{ const response = await fetch('/api/customers/'+ customer._id, { method: 'DELETE' }) } const Titles = { userid: 'User ID', name: 'Name', surname: 'Surname', eposta: 'Eposta', date: 'Date Of Registration', update: 'Update User', delete: 'Delete User', }; const Home = () => { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const fetchCustomers = async () => { const response = await fetch('/api/customers') const json = await response.json() if (response.ok) { setCustomers(json) } } fetchCustomers() }, []) return (
